data.title: Company History
data.text:
Since the inception of Nihon Insight Technologies Corporation, we have been concentrating on our capability to provide our customers the highest quality services and products by aiming toward becoming No.1 Java engineer group and unlocking the future by advanced ICT technologies. As the ICT industry develops day to day we have aquired our strength in business through our proven track record of business relations with Japan's major companies and our technically advanced performance with the Java/Scala know-how along with employees' team spirit. Here is the brief description of the transition.

2021

Apr.

Trained and started providing services by ServiceNow staff qualified of service management cloud Saas provider.

Jan.

Nagoya sales branch opened on the 40th floor of Lucent Tower

2020

Apr.

Signed partner contract with Rablock, leading block chain company.

2019

Apr.

Obtained Information Security Management System (ISMS) certification to enhance personal Information Security. [ Certification number: JQA-IM1611 ]

2018

Sep.

Participated Pega's Customer Engagement Summit Tokyo exhibit.

Jun.

Signed partner contract with business intelligence solution vendor, MicroStrategy.

Mar.

Participated Scalamatsuri 2018, Japan's largest Scala conference, as a Samurai sponsor.

Feb.

Joined Docomo 5G Open Partner Program.

2017

Dec.

Signed partner contract with Denmark Sitecore that provides contents management, digital marketing and e-commerce solution

Oct.

Jointly participated with LTS in ITpro EXPO 2017 on RPA implementation service.

Apr.

Became a member of New York information service chamber of commerce(JIF).

Feb.

Participated in Japan's largest Scala conference ScalaMatsuri 2017 as a Samurai sponsor.

2016

Jan.

Relocated its headquarters to Mihara building where is a land of its founding.

2014

Aug.

Set up Global Business Department to promote global business transaction.

Jun.

Divided organization into industry focused business groups:

- Financial/insurance business group.

- Information/communication service business group.

- Retail/distribution/public service business group.

May

Subsidiary Insight Technologies America Inc. obtained E-visa from US Government. This enabled to obtain E-visa for additional employees.

Apr.

Participated in Advanced Medical Bio-bank Management system development jointly with Chiba University Medical School.

Apr.

Sponsored "Nanohana Competition 14 (for students) organized by Chiba University's Venture Business Laboratories with special prize "Nihon Insight Technologies Award".

2013

May

College grad training with Ei-ichi Shibusawa's "Analects talk" and "Analects and abacus".

Mar.

Business transaction started with NTT Data Inc.

Mar.

System developed for life and casualty insurance company.

2012

Jul.

Subsidiary company Insight Technologies America Inc. USA set up in Melville, New York.

Jul.

Business transaction started with Fujitsu Systems East Inc.

Mar.

Partner contract signed with hybris (now SAP Commerce Cloud). Germany, for Multichannel Commerce Suite software. Attended at hybris booth in E-Commerce Exhibit,Tokyo.

First Partner Conference excuted.

2011

Jun.

Partner contract signed with Pega, USA, for BPM package software SmartBPM.

2010

May

First run race around the Imperial Palace on welcoming new college grad employees.

Jan.

ERMaster developed by our employee appeared on @IT Magazine.

2008

Apr.

Sales revenue exceeded 1 Billion Yen in 2007.

Feb.

Press release : SOA resale contract signed with Fiorano Software, USA.

2007

Sep.

Exclusive resale contract signed with Tangosol, USA, for data grid computing software Coherence targeted at semiconductor, automotive, banking and securities.

Sep.

OPN Member Partner contract signed with Nihon Oracle.

Jul.

Resale contract signed with NICE, Italy for grid portal software EngineFrame.

2006

Apr.

Number of employees exceeded 100.

PrivacyMark logo use permitted.

2005

Yokohama sales office set up on 16F Tenri BLDG.

2004

Overseas liason office set up in Boston, Massachusetts, USA.

2002

HQ moved to Sanpuku BLDG.

2000

Apr.

College grads hired as first employees.

1998

May

Company founded on May 18.

Established with 45 Million Yen in capital. Number of employees is 1.

HQ set up at Mihara Bldg. 4 Chome Ginza Chuo-ku Tokyo.

Started as a Java-focused software house. Company logo represents scenery of Mt. Tsukuba

viewed from founder's home land.

Company birth place: world famous the Ginza.

HQ of Nihon Insight Technologies

set up on 3F Mihara BLDG.
